text: Daniel Gregory Feuerriegel (born October 29, 1981) is an Australian actor. He is known for his role as "Agron" in the series Spartacus: Blood and Sand, Spartacus: Vengeance and Spartacus: War of the Damned. Starting in 2021, he starred in Days of Our Lives as EJ DiMera. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Australian movie actors Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from Sydney
title: Dan Feuerriegel
